attributes.action: set the date for an election so that he can become an elected prime minister rather than a default PM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in the uk do not have a democracy as Gordon Brown stands as PM in the current circumstances. He has not been elected by the public to lead this country and is therefore an imposter. we have a dictatorship through default. this is not an acceptable series of events.  Set the date. NOW.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
